description: Compute the matter power spectrum (MPS) from halo-only grafic cubes at z=0
instructions: For each halo-filtered grafic cube created in the previous task, compute the matter power spectrum (MPS) following the same Fourier analysis as for the full matter cubes. Output the power spectrum as a text file with two columns: wavenumber k (in units of h/cMpc) and P(k) (in units consistent with the cube normalization).
expected_output: Text files with the halo-only matter power spectra for each simulation model at z=0.
